dinosaurs.name: Tyrannosaurus rex
dinosaurs.description: One of the largest carnivorous dinosaurs, known for its large size, powerful jaws, and short forelimbs.

dinosaurs.name: Triceratops horridus
dinosaurs.description: A large herbivorous dinosaur characterized by its three facial horns and large bony frill.

dinosaurs.name: Velociraptor mongoliensis
dinosaurs.description: A small, agile carnivorous dinosaur known for its distinctive sickle-shaped retractable claw on each hind foot.

dinosaurs.name: Stegosaurus stenops
dinosaurs.description: A herbivorous dinosaur characterized by its double row of bony plates along its back and spikes on its tail.
